title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.75 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.75 - General

State Regulations

That the presence in or upon the public areas of an air
terminal of an automotive vehicle or piece of mobile equipment not bearing a
license plate issued by a State motor vehicle department is likely to endanger
persons or property in or upon said public areas and render the use of said
public areas unsafe, and on such automotive vehicle or piece of mobile
equipment shall be allowed on such public areas unless it shall conform to the
rules and regulations set forth in this Part for the use of the air
terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
